comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/10949
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/d113d2590ee22c30b84dd1ce6671175b8c7b1e54
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit d113d2590ee22c30b84dd1ce6671175b8c7b1e54
Author: Chuck Short <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Aug 7 07:26:46 2012 -0500

    Added updated locations for iscsiadm
    
    Attaching volumes to instances currently result in a
    traceback running on 12.10.
    
    This is due to the change of location from /sbin to
    /usr/bin for iscsiadm.
    
    Fixes LP: #1033960
    
    Change-Id: Ie8c6214efbac72b2715264a7d9dd7fe5e43ef693
    Signed-off-by: Chuck Short <email address hidden>
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
